features.name: Add & manage clients

features.name: Create invoices by selecting clients
features.description: Generate Swiss QR-bill invoices in seconds by selecting from your client list. Automatic tax calculations and professional formatting included.

features.name: Track invoice status & reconcile payments
features.description: Monitor Paid, Pending, and Overdue invoices at a glance. Auto-sync with your bank for real-time payment matching, with manual CAMT upload as fallback.

reviews.title: Trusted by Swiss businesses across the country

reviews.title: Finally, Swiss invoicing made simple.
reviews.body: As a freelancer in Zürich, I was struggling with QR-bill compliance. PayMatch made it effortless - I can create professional invoices in minutes.

reviews.title: Payment reconciliation is a game-changer.
reviews.body: Uploading CAMT files and having payments automatically matched to invoices saves me hours every week. My accountant loves the clean data.
reviews.author: Thomas Müller, SME Owner

reviews.title: Perfect for Swiss businesses.

reviews.title: Professional and compliant.

reviews.title: Saves me 5 hours per week.

reviews.title: Team collaboration is excellent.

reviews.title: GDPR compliance built-in.
